plugin.name: ziggeo-video-for-gravity-forms
plugin.title: Ziggeo Video for Gravity Forms
plugin.author: Ziggeo
plugin.tags: ziggeo, video, video field, gravity forms, video submission
plugin.description: This plugin is providing an easy and simple way for you to add Ziggeo to your Gravity Forms forms through special Ziggeo fields.
plugin.highlight: Added tags handling as well as parsing of predefined tags and tags based on other fields
